channel.title: Promo on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Promo on Damien Saunders

item.title: You can follow me on Twitter
item.description:
Did you know that social media is more than just blogs and RSS feeds? Well I hope so.
I have a following on Twitter that is <— this BIG —> which is a lot for little me. Maybe you prefer Twitter because you can dip in to the Twitterstream – maybe you should try following me. What does Damien Saunders have to share on Twitter? Damien’s Twitter account is kept updated 24/7 with the latest headlines from across my Internet websites.

item.title: I’m on WordPress Stack Exchange … are you?

item.title: Remember to add my Google+ Page
item.description:
Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add Damien’s Google+ page.
I’ll be sharing the latest presentations and other news and marketing stuff only on my Google+ page.

item.title: How-To for WordPress – maintain and improve your website
item.description: Looking for some ideas to help improve or maintain WordPress .. here’s my collection of useful articles and How-To Guides [related_posts limit=”10″ image=”0″] Need some help or training with WordPress? [featured_products per_page=”12″ columns=”4″ orderby=”date” order=”desc”]

item.title: Merry Christmas to everyone .. make the most of it
item.description: Merry Christmas … I found this quote recently and I think it’s quite funny and timely ~Richard Lamm I hope you’re having a great day! wherever you are in the world – make the most of it. Thanks for your support this year and hope to see you again soon.

item.title: Woothemes 5 for 1 Weekend special
item.description: Have you been thinking about getting a new look for your WordPress site? And not just themes, you can buy the WooCommerce extensions with up to 50% off. This weekend WooThemes are offering a number of black Friday and cybermonday specials. You can choose: Buy 1 theme get 4 extra themes (5-4-1 themes 20% off a monthly membership And many more … Click the image below …

item.title: Are you following me ( on Twitter )
item.description: Did you know that social media is more than just blogs and RSS feeds? Well I hope so. I have a following on Twitter that is <— this BIG —> which is a lot for little ol’ me. Maybe you prefer Twitter because you can dip in to the Twitterstream – maybe you should try following me. What does Damien Saunders have to share on Twitter? Damien’s Twitter account is kept updated 24/7 with the latest headlines from across my Internet websites.

item.title: Remember to add my Google+ Page
item.description:
Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add Damien’s Google+ page.
I’ll be sharing the latest presentations and other news and marketing stuff only on my Google+ page.
